agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, April 15, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie HB 2498 Paddie Relating to the procedure for acting on an application for a permit for a surface coal mining and reclamation operation. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
